scripts.run:all: concurrently "cd frontend && yarn start:all" "cd services && yarn start:all"
scripts.generate: concurrently "npx nswag run services/Core.Client/config.nswag" "npx nswag run frontend/core/src/core.config.nswag" "cd services/Core.CLient && refitter -s core.refitter" "cd services/Core && node node_modules/openapi-gen -f ../../services/Core.Client/openApi.yaml -o Controllers -l cs -p Core"
